reset text: A code to reset the account password will be sent to the entered email
email not found: The user with this email is not registered
unknown request error: An error has occurred. Try to repeat the request later.
code was sent: The code has been sent, a repeat request is possible in
wrong email or password: The user was not found or the password is incorrect
change password text: Enter the verification code from the email to change the password
wrong code: The code is incorrect or expired
already exist: A user with this email has already been registered
verify text: The activation code has been sent to your email
incorrect password: 8+ characters, uppercase letter, lowercase letter, digit, special character
fetch success: The changes have been successfully saved
wrong password: You entered the wrong old password
incorrect translation: Only english letters and commas are allowed
translation brief: If you know several translations of the word, you can enter them separated by commas
daily schedule: A new daily task appears a day after adding a new word to the dictionary.
weekly schedule: A new weekly task appears one week after completing a daily task.
monthly schedule: A new monthly task appears one month after completing a weekly task.
you receive this task again: You will receive this task again in a
